title: Learning in community
description: Become part of humanity’s collective knowledge expansion. Something that may not feel insightful to you might help someone else uncover an insight. This is a team effort. Try your best to be right, but don’t worry when you’re wrong. Repeatedly. If you feel uncomfortable, or like an impostor, good. You’re pushing yourself.

title: Create your own niche
description: Austin Klein quotes John Higgs: There’s a concept in ecology of ‘niche creation.’ And the idea is: it’s not the case that a species will sort of come along and go, ‘oh, I could do well here, there’s lots of food,’ and things like that. A species comes along and just does his thing, and […]

title: Escaping the insecurity of a new venture
description: Will you use this opportunity to grow and evolve or will you use it to beat yourself up?   How will you avoid insecurity work? … Will you default to the norms of your industry, or will you be an original? Via Josh Withers   I’ve caught myself lately slipping into default mode for fear of […]

title: Long COVID is what worries me
description: Still masking up indoors 😷 I was thrilled yesterday that my eye doctor only sees people by appointment and requires masks in their office. I don’t know how much longer I can avoid indoor spaces but I’m planning to continue masking when I do. COVID numbers seem to be on the rise. I’m thinking it’s […]

title: Running a specialty bookstore
description: This type of collection curation and ongoing promotion sounds fun to me. I’ve never worked retail, though 🤷‍♀️
